Package goblinoverflow

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • goblinoverflow.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class Simulation
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Simulation class is responsible for running the game. It contains the main game loop. It can do so by being runnable. Connects logic, gui and model. It also has implementation of vsync of drawing frames.

    Author:
    glycerolveinz

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation​(String name)
        Simulation constructor. Sets simulation state to not running. Creates gui of the simulation.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the simulation. Also name of the frame that will display the simulation.
